Caption: A view of the audience at the Open Air Theatre (OAT) during the fifth convocation
Description: The fifth convocation was held at 5 p.m. on 1st August 1968. Dr. A. L. Mudaliar, Chairman, Board of Governors, presided over the convocation. Dr. Vikram A. Sarabhai, Chairman, Atomic Energy Commission, was the chief guest for the occasion.
